Alternate Contact: Nicolette Jacques, Program Coordinator; Phone: 250.868.3307; Email: NJacques@FestivalsKelowna.com
Service Details: - Presents live concerts and other arts-based activities during Jul and Aug in many outdoor venues throughout the city- Produces over 50 family-friendly events each year that are suitable for people of all ages and tastes- Performers range from local artists to world-class professionals, performing in a variety of musical genres and styles- Programs and events include the Canada Day Kelowna Celebration, Parks Alive!, the Kelowna Buskers Program, Pianos in the Parks, Arts on the Avenue and the New York New Year's Family Celebration
